name: Ultimate Crystal Formation
desc: When a “Crystal Beast” monster you control is destroyed by battle: Send to the GY 7 “Crystal Beast” cards with different names from your hand, your Deck, and/or face-up from your field; Special Summon 1 “Rainbow Dragon” Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon). If a face-up “Rainbow Dragon” monster you own leaves the field because of an opponent’s card effect while you control it: You can banish this card from your GY; place any number of “Crystal Beast” monsters from your GY face-up in your Spell & Trap Zones as Continuous Spells.
